paragraphs.text: %md # Useful Database Utilities This Notebook describes a number of utilities that you may find useful. We'll expand this list over time. For now, we have these sections: * *Discovering the Splice Machine Versions* shows you how to call a Splice Machine system procedure to display which version of Splice Machine you are running. * *Listing the Tables in Your Database* shows you a `SELECT` statement that displays all of the tables in your database All you need to do is click to run each paragraph and see the results.

msg.data:
Useful Database Utilities

This Notebook describes a number of utilities that you may find useful. We’ll expand this list over time. For now, we have these sections:

  • Discovering the Splice Machine Versions shows you how to call a Splice Machine system procedure to display which version of Splice Machine you are running.
  • Listing the Tables in Your Database shows you a SELECT statement that displays all of the tables in your database

All you need to do is click to run each paragraph and see the results.

paragraphs.title: Listing the Tables in Your Database
paragraphs.text:
%splicemachine

select t.TABLENAME, s.SCHEMANAME from SYS.SYSTABLES t, SYS.SYSSCHEMAS s where t.SCHEMAID = s.SCHEMAID;
